name: Garrett Rook
text: Blaze Pizza is a great place to go. Friendly staff and a whole lot of options, including vegan and gluten-free. Good price is you're looking to take your family out.

name: JGS
text: Fresh fresh fresh and incredibly flavorful! Darn good pizza. Easily the best I've had in Idaho Falls. We had the Build Your Own variety and trust me when I say there are plenty of possibilities from signature sauces, to cheeses to gobs of toppings. Definitely a home run folks. I'll be back. Peace.

name: Lindsey Mackintosh
text: Delicious! And the girl who made my pizza tonight was so sweet and patient. Will definitely be back!

name: Alyssa Farnes
text: The customizability of the pizzas is a great feature. They also have great combo options such as a half pizza and salad. The employees were very friendly and helpful! I definitely recommend Blaze for a yummy and reasonably priced meal.

name: Donna Smith
text: This was our first time here. It was fun creating our own pizza. We split a pizza and created our own on half instead of doing the half pizza. I like the veggie options and salad choices. The price was excellent. We went with the big crust. ‚Ä¶More

name: Todd Vadnais
text: I order a veggie pizza for my wife with added chicken. Every time, no chicken. I called this last time and waited for 20 minuets before I finally hung up. I went to the website blaze pizza/help.  Ha! No help. You can‚Äôt really get anywhere ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt Urick
text: We went right when they opened and they had a few kinks to work out. However, by the time we went back it was a smooth operation. Pizza and atmosphere are great! I also think they are dialed into a good, affordable price point. It's satisfying and filling and doesn't break the bank.

name: Jennifer Jones
text: We've eaten at Blaze in the past and liked it, but recently it's been really bad. Today we went and they were out of several toppings. Fine. Tables were blocked off, which we get (Covid-19), and this makes sense except the tables they had ‚Ä¶More

name: U G
text: By far the best Pizza in town. Customer service is awesome. Pizza is crisp and amazingly they cook it fast. Loved it!

name: Food Critic
text: Fun place to go and have pizza. The topping selection is impressive, and the crust is really good. I enjoy the ambiance and the staff have been great. They have a couple juice drink options that are really unique and tasty. That and the quality of the pizza made this a definite 5 star experience.

name: Becky Furgason
text: I ordered pizza here on the recommendation of my PT. I was not impressed. The staff wasn‚Äôt rude, but awkwardly cold, the cauliflower crust wasn‚Äôt very good IMO and the toppings were almost nonexistent, it was almost all crust.

name: Michael Hervieux
text: Pizzas are actually quite good but we had a bad experience (hair cooked into the sauce) and contacted them twice to try and get a response. Both times they simply ignored us. I get that bad things can happen but I won't continue ordering from a place that ignores the negative experiences of their customers.

name: John Orzechowski
text: Best pizza ive had(out west) since I moved out west from the East coast 20y ago. Very tasty very affordable...and they have beer! Glad I found this place. Its a chain but... hey its awesome pizza and thats all that matters to me.

name: Jason Jantzen
text: It was ok. Like good quality boxed pizza. It is made fresh, but the crust is pretty boring. It's a thin crust that lacks any bread quality you might recognize in a good tasting thin crust pizza. Pizza Pie Cafe is better because of price and ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Henke
text: I did the BBQ Chicken and my wife did a gluten free 2 topping pizza. I'm not a huge fan of thin crust pizza overall and this one didn't seem much different than anywhere else I've tried. I DID think it was cool how fast the pizza cooks ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Bostrom
text: The pizza was great. The service was great. We have a gluten allergy in our family and they were very helpful and kind to accommodate for our needs. I would definitely come back and recommend this place.

name: Tim Lorz
text: My first visit ever to Blaze. Loved the concept. Came after lunch rush. Had 4 employees to 4 family members. Perfect. Very nice staff.

name: Nathan Egan
text: Pizza & Salads are pretty good, nice modern design. Good quantity & quality for the price. Good beverage selection (Coke Products) I ordered the Meat Eater and swapped the red onions for Jalape√±os. In my picture I also had their Caesar ‚Ä¶More

name: Capture Life2018
text: Blaze pizza, next-door to Costa Vida off of Sunnyside Road. Their food is absolutely amazing. I love the Hot Link and the BBQ pizza. If you need a quick bite to eat, these guys are great!  By the time you order, pay for your pizza, and get a drink your pizza is done!

name: Tyler Wyman
text: We love Blaze Pizza! We come all the way down from Rexburg to get Pizza here üòä we have really enjoyed our service from Julio! He‚Äôs extremely personable and is always a highlight of coming to Blaze!

name: Jacob Andersen
text: I love the mobile app. I order in just a few clicks.  Their pizza is good but honestly, the mobile app is what keeps me ordering from them.

name: TY Markley
text: Fast. Clean. Friendly. Delicious. Affordable, fresh pizza. What else can you ask for?

name: James Grimm
text: We like the build your own pizza option here. Fast, great tasting. This is one of my favorite places for pizza. It does have a kind of fast food look to the place. Don't let that turn you away. Missing anchovies and bland seating area are the missing star.

name: Steven Juber
text: We received a coupon in the mail for a free pizza in store only and were excited to try this new pizza joint in town. My 61 year old mother took my 8 year old nephew up to the store to redeem the free pizza associated with the coupon. She ‚Ä¶More

name: Hayden Ferney
text: The pizza cooker named Jasmine just sat there while are pizza's were cooking, and wasn't even paying attention to our pizza's which left them completely burnt. I also heard her yell at the staff a couple of times in front of us. Which is ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Tomlinson
text: Highly recommended.

name: Cat Brennan
text: New to the area, we got an ad in the mail with a discount for a pizza, so we said, hey, why not? We ordered a large pepperoni and meatball with basil pesto drizzle. It was PHENOMENAL! Fast delivery, too! We will definitely be ordering again!

name: Jacek Yates
text: I for one love pizza. But when it comes to Blaze pizza, it‚Äôs mediocre at best. If I want to get a pizza, I‚Äôd rather go to MOD or Rizzos. On top of all of that, the customer service was sub-par. It felt like they were working at half speed ‚Ä¶More

name: Casey Killian
text: The pizza was good, staff was friendly, however the dining room was absolutely a wreck.  Tables had bits of food on them, the staff wasn't busy, or rushed, there were maybe 6 small groups of patrons, sticky floor, and one came out to clean ‚Ä¶More

name: Easton Worthington
text: Love Blaze! By far a fun and fast paced environment. Fun to work and eat at. Highly recommend it to everyone. Be creative with your pizza and make it your own. My shift lead (Sydney) is super awesome and if she is very organized and on top ‚Ä¶More

name: Kari Clements
text: Clean. Amazing fun employees. High quality ingredients on display! Patient, intelligent, and kind customer service. Good specials and coupons. Pizza was FAST, DELICIOUS, and NEW KINDS OF FUN. The soda machine has this new brand of soda ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael McGuffey
text: Nice employees. Fast pizza. They have s spicy red sauce that's pretty darn good. The only down side is I only saw one size of pizza. And that's not all that bad. Overall they make a really good pizza.

name: Lynette Wilson
text: The crust and toppings are all so fresh, it is amazing. I will definitely go back! I really enjoy having it set at one price and then being able to get all the toppings I want. Their garlic cheddar knots are also so yummy! I went at lunch time and even though there were a lot of people there they got our food out to us quickly.

name: LastChance710 D
text: Blaze is super delicious. I love the choice of toppings and Sydney always cooks my pizza super crispy. The team at Blaze always takes care of me and I never worry about who is behind the counter. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelsee Allison
text: If you order online you best be on your way as you're ordering. They stick the online orders on a shelf with no heating, so by the time I got home the pizza was cold. Way too much garlic on the pizza, everything else is pretty bland. I'll stick with Rizo's. They're better quality and cost less.

name: Becky Buddenbohm
text: Loved my Keto pizza crust pizza tonight!!!! So happy to be able too have pizza and not all the carbs!!!

name: Jake Gallup
text: The pizza was fantastic,  the service was great, and the workers welcomed us with a smile. The garlic knots were tasty too! Will likely be back even though it's way out of my way!

name: Matthew Ary
text: I love the acidity of their red sauce, it makes their pizza taste as fresh as they promote it to be. Their drinks are fun and different too! However their pizzas are only good when they are fresh. Their flavor doesn't last long after it's ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Alworth
text:
Friendly staff and great service!
Great vegan options

name: Renee Carden
text: Great pizza! The person that took my order,very rude, probably showing off,lots of young people back there to show off. Not impressed with the customer service.. other than that all good.

name: Shelley Miner
text: Great employee service, clean place, and good pizza - lots of toppings, sauces, and cheeses to choose from. The keto crust is really good too.

name: Brian Wright
text: Definitely a new favorite! The pizza crust is fantastic, and I've had it fired extra crispy a couple of times as well...perfect! Our family enjoys the build your own option for one price regardless of topping choices/amounts. That's a great ‚Ä¶More

name: Travis Parker
text:
It was my first time there. The pizza was pretty good. And definitely enough to fill you up. The service was pretty good too.
Personally, I didn‚Äôt really like the spicy red sauce. But I tried some of my kids‚Äô pizza, they got the regular sauce, it was way better.  Lots to choose from and pretty fast

name: Nicolas McLaughlin
text: The service was good and the food rate good and fresh. Worth the money.

name: Bob Denkers
text: Lots of good fresh toppings and a really good Pizza and salad.  The dough balls are great.  Nice place, like getting a pizza Subway sandwich style.  Definitely go again.

name: Amanda Barker
text: Been waiting to try this place. Really thin crust and very light toppings won't be back. Also don't like how you pick your pizza up off a rack. Like how many other people came and looked inside my pizzas?

name: Frank Tomasetti
text: Pretty good place to grab a quick piece of pizza. Pretty clean inside, the staff was very friendly. Pizza crust was interesting, a little different, but nice and crispy and perfectly cooked. The only issue I had was watching them skimp out ‚Ä¶More

name: Sydney Bahr
text: Delicious! I‚Äôve been going to Blaze for years now and they never disappoint. If they ever mess my pizza up, they give that one to me in addition to  making me a brand new one! Great customer service. Kind, easy to work with, and incredible pizza! The agua frescas and lemonades are also yummy! The rewards system on the app is great too.

name: Gabby Caligiuri
text: Best pizza I‚Äôve had to date in Idaho falls. You can‚Äôt beat the freshness & quality for the price! Especially when you can literally get WHATEVER you want & it‚Äôs still the same price. So so good.

name: Mary Dement
text: If you get this twice I'm, sorry. Service was excellent, food was excellent, friendly young adults. Great customer service.

name: Joe Anderson
text: I had the white top. So the pizzas are fully customizable and the menu really is there to inspire you since you can add to or take away. The pizzas are made like subway where you walk down and add items you want. They have a huge brick ‚Ä¶More

name: Helaman Jones
text: The food is Great!!!  I go there all the time!  The employees are so helpful and nice.üòÅ

name: pottymouth starseed
text: After receiving a coupon in the mail, we set up a small get together with some friends. I ordered my food online as the coupons was for online only, and it was ready at the time I requested. The pizza was alright, but we felt it needed ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Sessions
text: Extremely impressed. The food is incredible. We customized two pizzas, which were very different, and they both were amazing. The staff was kind and broke down every thing for us. Will be back many more times.

name: Taylor Garner
text: I found a HAIR in my food!!

name: Iris Judd
text: First experience with Blaze Pizza did not leave me with a good impression. Unfortunately, my pizza was left too long on the blaze.

name: Lacey Secrist
text: We love it here! The made a gluten free pizza for my daughter who has Celiac's and switched gloves,  washed utensils,  and were very careful for her! It was delicious and quick with fantastic service!

name: Matt Campbell
text: Finally a blaze pizza in our neck of the woods.  Grand opening day was incredibly delicious. This is now the best pizza place in town.  Finally a pizza place that doesn't  charge you for every little skimpy topping. The ingredients were so ‚Ä¶More

name: Nathan Riblett
text: Good food, polite staff.  The tables were very dirty though.

name: Savannah Medina
text: I love being able to customize my pizza & see it made in front of me! The pizza was delicious & customer service & prices were both great!

name: Ted Chambers
text: super good pizza with fresh ingredients, the staff is always pleasant and friendly!

name: Jessica Humphries
text: Fantastic, fast, and friendly service. Gluten free was delicious and they knew what to do!!

name: Ben Wallace
text: The pizza was good but not sure if the is as amazing as the commericals make it sound

name: Jenny Brown
text: So the first time I went it was great. Good service and great food quality. The next two times not so much! I showed up last Sunday at 8:40....they were suppose to stay open until 9pm. When I walked in they told me they had shut down some ‚Ä¶More

name: Anonymous
text: Customer service was terrible. No one would tell me to move forward in line. First time here and this will be the last

name: Sherry Clements
text: Very good pizza. Inside the building was really hot however. So you sit and sweat while you eat. Please add air conditioning. But good pizza.

name: Maryann Waagen
text: Has been great every time we have gone in. Great service.

name: Jacob Hintze
text: Great product allowing customization for the whole family.

name: Eric E. Vera
text: Friggin delicious! Pretty fast service, kinda surprised when i found out they had draft beer there! Better than MOD pizza. Cant wait to go back.

name: Elsie Anderson
text: It was delicious and they didn't skimp on topi gs the price was good as well

name: Kenyon Turner
text: Great Pizza place. For 8$ you can get whatever you want üëç got my veggies and a lot of meat. Keto dough has more than 50 grams of protein if you're looking for ultimate Gainz.

name: Casey Head
text: Great food, great service, and the manager has the best jokes.

name: Jacob Gulbransen
text: Food was pretty good but the service was indifferent.  They messed up on my order and didn't seem to care when I pointed out that they got it wrong.  Had to go back 3 times before I got my full order and never got my order right.

name: Jim Haldy
text: We love the "make your own" from their extensive list of crusts, sauces, and toppings, delicious.  From the time you walk in until the hand you your custom pizza is only a few short minutes.

name: James Glancy
text: Very good pizza with gluten free and keto friendly options. They build your pizza right in front of you per your instructions, so you get exactly what you want. The keto crust is shockingly good! friendly staff and a drink machine that ‚Ä¶More

name: Marianna Huffman
text: Great salads and pizzas, whether you make you own or have one of their specialty pizzas. The staff is super nice and they have a really good cauliflower crust!!

name: Kenneth Gilbert
text: This was my first visit to a Blaze Pizza.  I first noticed one in Farmington, Utah next to the University of Utah Hospital facility.  My wife, daughter, and I went to this pizza place.  I should first note that my family pretty much has me ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg Furlong
text: Good place to grab a quick bite.

name: Jeff Henry
text: Amazing as always

name: scott hanson
text:
The single serving, eat in option is the only way to go! We always love the unity of the staff and the build-your-own is my favorite.
It can get a bit loud, but that just reminds me of Shakey's pizza from my younger days.

name: Ed Crapo
text: It was good pizza. I opted for the build your own pizza option. They assisted me with choosing sauces. I really enjoyed it.

name: Brennan Green
text: It's great to know you have a pizza place that gives you gluten free options, and allows you to choose the cheese and toppings. Great place to eat and highly recommended.

name: Panda Bear
text: It was ok. I got the red vine and to me it needed more cheese (one slice almost didn't have any) and wasn't all that flavorful. They forgot part of our order too but refunded it and gave us a coupon when we called. The "bread knot" things are really good though. Not sure it was worth $

name: Sherrie Watts
text: Fast friendly service. Huge portions. Really good prices. Great food!

name: Todd Flatland
text: Eh, it's a less good MOD Pizza. Little more expensive as well, and toppings options were not as great. Did in a pinch for pizza, but probably won't be back. The staff was really awesome, though, or I would have gone 1 star.

name: Juanita Hathaway
text: Door dash was fast, but disappointed on the pizza. I ordered theb Veg out with no mushrooms but was not expecting a strange yellow (not sure if it's a fruit or vegie) thing on my pizza in big chunks. Thought it was pineapple until I tried ‚Ä¶More

name: Dana Stiffler
text: Great pizza and really good prices. It wasn‚Äôt busy when we went, but we were still surprised at how fast it was! We will definitely be back!

name: Kase Powell
text: Great food. Amazing service. The employees were so friendly and Syd was so professional! Definitely coming back.

name: Dillon Mosher
text: It's often easy to judge based on whether or not something goes wrong; but something, it's the way a situation is handled that matters more. Unfortunately, my pizza came to me burnt, but with the stipulation that they had already put a new ‚Ä¶More

name: Hope Davis
text: Liked it a lot! Super friendly staff that were very patient with all of their customers. Such a huge plus when staff is friendly!!

name: Spencer Garner
text: It had really great pizza and a good selection of options, including some vegetarian and gluten free.

name: David Moran
text: I have never had a negative experience here.

name: Jason Atwood
text: The pizza is fricken awesome!  Has great customer service!

name: 1raberfamily
text: The pizza was just so so. The deal breaker is the fact that they don‚Äôt have straws for their drinks. Instead they have sippy cups. I‚Äôll pass. They can keep their sippy cups and I‚Äôll take my business else where.

name: David Moulton
text: I love Blaze Pizza!!! They always get my order right! And they get your pizza out with in 180 seconds! I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to eat!!

name: Mary Sherman
text: Yummy!  I love being able to customize my pizza.

name: Keith Moon
text: Not alot of pepperoni on our pizza not much cheese and tons of sauce the staff was great tho.

name: Dawnelle Thomas
text: You can build your own

name: Katrin Lepler
text: I often don't see the point in spending money for pizza that often seems the similar, greasy style. Blaze's pizza was a very pleasant surprise.

name: Chris Obay
text: Just doesnt taste good!! Didnt like having the black stuff all over my hands either.

name: Kortney Klinkel
text: Yummy pizza, cold beer, fast!

name: Humberto Leija
text: It wasn't a good experience. Or of the worst services we've received in a long time. Kids yelling at each other from one side of the store to the other....... unprofessional! Don't think, I would return there again.

name: Kelsey Hartman
text: Amazing food with fabulous ingredients! Wonderful customer service!!! Clean and great atmosphere! Killer soda!!!!!

name: Stacey Pack
text: Ordered take out with coworkers for dinner, when I arrived they had forgotten 2 orders of dough knots, (per the phone that NOBODY answers,) we ordered online so we could ‚Äúget our pizzas the exact way we like it!‚Äù I had to wait for those, ‚Ä¶More

name: Beth Edmiston
text: Staff was friendly, food was good, and the place was clean.

name: Racquel Clark
text: I love this pizza place! I will say I'm partial because they have vegan options and I'm 99% sure they are the only ones in town that offer vegan "cheese". I believe the "cheese" brand is Follow your Heart, which is a great brand that I keep ‚Ä¶More

name: Jordan Russell
text: Probably my favorite pizza place in Idaho. I always build my own and they‚Äôre good about getting it just how you want it.

name: Stetson Peterson
text: Quick easy place to eat

name: Melissa Johnson
text: Best pizza, build your own is bomb. For some reason the are ALWAYS out of the new keto crust.

name: Wes Wear
text: Good pizza. Nice dining room. Great experience!

name: Andrew Wilson
text: Delicious pizza that's quick. There are so many options! It's a light and airy dining area.

name: Logan Thomas
text: Excellent customer service, nice atmosphere, and the pizza is great. Thanks for coming to town Blaze Pizza!

name: Peter Medina
text: Blaze is a fast, affordable and friendly place to eat

name: James Lee
text: You can make your own pizza or buy them all ready made. Closes thing to real Italian Pizza . Thin crust. Lots of veggies you can pick from including artichokes hearts. Choice of cheese, Mozzarella, parm; Reotta cheeses. The pizza sause is ‚Ä¶More

name: Mat Fro
text: Pizza is good and they don't mind if you want double of everything. No charge lol

name: David Boyter
text: Great food, clean and friendly.  Meat eater pizza was great.

name: Killsqueeze
text: Amazing pizzas with vegan cheese and vegan, gluten free chorizo! The staff was also super friendly and accommodating!

name: Kenneth Chiono
text: The experience and pizza were ok. The menu is very similar to that of Rizo's.  The amount of toppings used seemed to be pretty thin in comparison to that of Rizo's. I did like the Blue Sky soda, very tasty. The staff was friendly in ‚Ä¶More

text: Always amazing people and delicious pizza!

name: Elsheyin Starhand
text: Great pizza, many fresh options (including cauliflower and keto crusts), and good prices - if you're willing to run out for take-away, definitely hit Blaze!
